mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ktf_sys_resource t WHERE FIND_IN_SET(t.id, sys_resource_getChildren(#{id}))

DELETE FROM ktf_sys_resource WHERE id IN ( SELECT a.id FROM ( SELECT t0.id, t1.id AS pid FROM ktf_sys_resource t0 LEFT JOIN ktf_sys_resource t1 ON t0.pid = t1.id WHERE t0.pid > 0 GROUP BY t0.pid ) a WHERE a.pid IS NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(id) FROM ktf_sys_resource t WHERE t.resource_type = #{resourceType}
